title: 73/281. Shifting the management paradigm in the United Nations

paragraphs.1: Takes note of the report of the Secretary-General;1
paragraphs.2: Endorses the conclusions and recommendations contained in the report of the Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions;2
paragraphs.3: Approves the proposal contained in the report of the Secretary-General;
paragraphs.4: Emphasizes the necessity of ensuring regular and direct engagement between the Department of Operational Support and the Department of Management Strategy, Policy and Compliance to ensure that policies are calibrated and more responsive to the operational needs of all Secretariat entities, including in the field;
paragraphs.5: Recalls paragraph 28 of its resolution 72/266 B, and requests the Secretary-General to include in his review the human resources functions, including an assessment of progress achieved towards equitable geographical representation, bearing in mind Article 101, paragraph 3, of the Charter of the United Nations.
